title: Best Pool Party skin released? (POLL)
body: So I guess my friend and I just did this out of boredom but we made a bet over which pool party skin was the best, me picking reksai and him picking renekton. (the winner between us gets a $10 Riot card so high stakes guys)  Now we know you guys may not agree with either but were going to put all the skins released out there for you to vote, because were honestly curious to find out which is the publics favorite.  Whichever one is ahead of the other will determine our winner but either way thankyou for taking the time to vote!

replies.body: While I helped work on Rek'Sai (which was probably one of my favorite skins to work on ever), I also really, really, really love Lulu's sounds and her giant squid hat. :D
Thats awesome you commented on this post and thankyou for your reply!  I dont play lulu much but i have to give you credit where its due, you did amazing work on the rek'sai skin!

Thanks for making an awesome post! 

I'm so glad you like the Pool Party skins! I think these are some of the coolest skins we've made (buuut I'm also really partial to event skins like Pool Party & Snowdown, haha). 

Since you said you really like Rek'Sai in your original post - what do you think of the Tremor Sense sounds/jet ski when you ult? :D
I was on the edge of buying him until i saw the ult, its too perfect!  Thanks again for all you do :)
Thank you for playing! ^-^

1. If you could read my most recent post, I slipped up pretty badly with a permanent ban but I remember you replying to my post on here and thought you may be able to look into it.  Even a permanent mute would be more than greatful compared to the alternative :/  Ive since gottten all the pool party skins by the way though!

Hi hi! 

Unfortunately, I don't have access to player behavior tools, so this isn't something I'd be able to look into. Your best bet here would be to contact Player Support via a ticket and see if they have additional information they can provide. 

That said, it's rare that permanent bans are reversed, unless there is a mistake on our end with our system.
Pool party lulu has been my favorite since I saw this gif: http://33.media.tumblr.com/da066a4a91b462a94573ed7e04f8caaf/tumblr_nppprn4kkN1r2ymt5o1_1280.gif
Haha thats too perfect

Nuff said
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG7R338JgqU
Renekton is still my favorite.
The only 2 champs on that list I have are Leona and Lulu.  Leona's is nice, but not what I'm looking for in a Leona skin.  Lulu's is cute, but I'm not sure it's not something I'd like to get either.
i was between zac, lulu, and draven....
Zac and Leona are the only two correct answers.
im slowly realizing this, although lulu is on the rise hah

Leona, cause she's the only female human in a swimsuit =|
I love Ziggs! He lloks so cute in those goggles
I really like PP Leona, the sunflower particles and chill tone of it was the whole reason I went and got Leona! However... PP Lulu is the best! The water noises really sold me.
Ive been watching spotlights for her and i gotta say im impressed, really thinking about getting that lulu skin
Where is the Pool Part Irelia option? I can't find it.
hahah one day maybe
by telling us which one you and your friend chose it  kind of affect my vote
Ah my bad haha, i just wanted to let you know my opinion but everyone should have their very favorite skin!
Zac is currently winning, with lulu in second, lets move my reksai up more!
Hmmm... it's a tie between Lee, Mundo, and Zac.
